src: Amak janari-dendara eraman ninduen.

src: Hamasei urte nituenean, gidatzen ikasi nuen.

src: Teresa artista bat zen.

src: Nire txakurrak etxeko aurreko atean itxaron zidan.

mt: 1. He ate reindeer meat, not knowing what kind of meat it was.

src: Sara dantzaria zen.
mt: Sara was a dancer.

mt: 1. He takes a bus from New York to New Jersey every day to go to work.

mt: Recently, many people have realized that things are asking for them are being stolen.

src: Paige oso ikasle ona zen.
